Articles.Content:
Are there any mods with mk 2 bomb bays? I'm building supersonic planes and the mk 2 cargo bays are kind of ridiculous. I also feel like the hinge position is limiting on wing placement.

Basically, I'm thinking of a mk 2 fuselage with the mk 1 section as a cargo bay with hideaway doors. So many mods have these nice vtol sections with fancy doors but they're never adapted to cargo bays... Unless I'm just not seeing it. Lots of mk 1, but no mk 2. I have SXT, quiz tech, mk2 stockalike, KAX, etc... Nothing seems to fit the bill. I can't be the only one who thinks this?
